value.name: telegram_chat_ids
value.description: List of allowed Telegram chat IDs.
Camera identifier. Valid characters are lowercase a-z, numbers and underscores.

value.name: cameras
value.description: Camera-specific configuration. All subordinate keys corresponds to the camera_identifier of a configured camera.

value.name: detection_label
value.description: Label of the object to send notifications for.

value.name: send_thumbnail
value.description: Send a thumbnail of the detected object.

value.name: send_video
value.description: Send a video of the detected object.
